attributes.action: Export Walid Salem back to Egypt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is the man who raided Munir Hussain's house, then took a severe beating from Mr Hussain for holding him and his family hostage. Mr Hussain went to jail while Walid Salem stayed free due to his injurys sustained in the attack. He then went on to commit credit card fraud, but could not stand court again due to the previous injurys. Its a joke, check his record, google the guy!

Get rid of him, this country needs to start getting tough with these people.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. When submitting a petition you must provide both your first and surname.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
